Private Methods

lib/tasks/npm-task.js:113

private findPackageManager( ): Promise

This method will determine what package manager (npm or yarn) should be used to install the npm dependencies.

Setting this.useYarn to true or false will force the use of yarn or npm respectively.

If this.useYarn is not set we check if yarn.lock exists and if yarn is available and in that case set useYarn to true.

Return:

Promise
lib/tasks/build-watch.js:49

private onInterrupt( )

Exit silently
